episodes.title: "Farage is running a cult" | Rupert Lowe on Reform UK and his "political assassination attempt"
episodes.description:
In an exclusive interview, Victoria Derbyshire talks to expelled Reform UK MP Rupert Lowe, who lays into Nigel Farage and warns that he must never become prime minister.

#Reform #ReformUK #nigelfarage #politics #uk #ukpolitics #news #latestnews #news #newsnight

episodes.title: Katy Morgan-Davies: Trapped in a London cult for 30 years - BBC Newsnight
episodes.description:
Katy Morgan-Davies was kept as a 'slave' by a Maoist cult leader for 30 years. She was born into the cult, didn't know who her parents were and even what mothers and fathers actually were.

Kirsty Wark takes her back to the house in Brixton, South London that she escaped from five years ago.

Newsnight is the BBC's flagship news and current affairs TV programme - with analysis, debate, exclusives, and robust interviews.
